{{Infobox Peripheral NOS |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Logitech |model = Webcam |submodelappend = yes |submodel = C600 |revision = 2 MP |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/10/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Logitech Webcam C600 |sernum = |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |if_connector_type = Male A |form_factor = corded device |vendor_id = 046d |device_id = 0808 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Logitech;SP4Gx 334-000037; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |linuxdriv = uvcvideo |win_driver = |is_manuf = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addl_chips = |flags = |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = webcam |availability = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B002NEG21W |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |manuf_country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Notes=== ====General==== "02.13.09" and "210-000599 REV.004" is silkscreened on the board in the images below. M/N V-U0007
P/N 860-000174
====Audio==== The device returns Mono (PCM, 16kHz) audio. ====Optics==== *It has an exchangeable objective lens. *Focus is adjusted manually. ====Controls==== Brightness Contrast Saturation White Balance Temperature, Auto Gain Power Line Frequency White Balance Temperature Sharpness Backlight Compensation Exposure, Auto Exposure (Absolute) Exposure, Auto Priority Pan (Absolute) Tilt (Absolute) Privacy LED1 Mode LED1 Frequency Disable video processing Raw bits per pixel ====Extension units==== TODO: each extension units has some functionality * [[82066163-7050-ab49-b8cc-b3855e8d221e]] * [[82066163-7050-ab49-b8cc-b3855e8d221f]] * [[82066163-7050-ab49-b8cc-b3855e8d2252]] * [[82066163-7050-ab49-b8cc-b3855e8d2251]] * [[b7935ba4-15c7-0245-90f4-532a3b311365]] * [[82066163-7050-ab49-b8cc-b3855e8d2250]] Marked as undefined: * [[82066163-7050-ab49-b8cc-b3855e8d2255]] ====Bugs==== *firmware provide wrong number of audio levels: provided ~6400; real ~14. workaround is available for linux. {{/Additional info}} ==Pictures==
